description: Removes a Windows Defender Firewall rule created to block a specific IPv4 address. Validates IPv4 format, searches by common rule names and by address filters, removes matches, and reports status as unblocked, partial, not_found, or error. Outputs NDJSON and writes atomically with .new fallback. Requires administrative privileges.

script_parameters.name: Direction
script_parameters.description: Firewall rule direction to target: Inbound or Outbound. Default: Inbound.
